1.0.0.name: wordpress/fpw-post-instructions
1.0.0.description: This plugin makes meta boxes on admin editing screens for posts, pages, links, and custom post types with instructions for editors. The content of these meta boxes can be entered/modified on plugin's settings page. Two methods of editing are available - plain text (HTML codes allowed) and visual text editing.
